remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> event when a Sort button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the sort operation. (A Sort button is a button whose `CommandName` property set to "Sort".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as customizing the sort expression.
A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method. This object enables you to specify or determine the sort expression and sort direction for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control. To determine the sort expression, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortExpression%2A> property. To determine the sort direction, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortDirection%2A> property. You can also cancel a sorting operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs> class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSelectEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> event is raised, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewSortEventArgs.SortExpression%2A> property to specify the sort expression that will be used to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control. The sort expression contains the name of the field to sort. You can also sort multiple columns at a time by programmatically setting this property to a comma-separated list of field names.
> [!NOTE] > By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control applies the sort direction to the complete list of columns. As a result, the sort direction applies to only the last column in the list.
